name: HomeManager
0:
”Alexa, turn on Luz Principal”
”Alexa, set Air to 22 degrees”
”Alexa, Blackout up”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the Home Manager and Alexa, you can talk to your house, performing many actions inside your home automation system. The Home Manager system is required to use this skill, check with a local vendor to purchase the products and integrate it with Alexa.

Some examples:
"Alexa, turn on Luz Principal"
"Alexa, set Air to 22 degrees"
"Alexa, Blackout up"
